name: General Dodonna (V)
Lore: 'Skilled tactician and natural leader. Planned attack on Death Star after analyzing technical readouts provided by Princess Leia. Star Destroyer captain during Old Republic.',
Text: 'During your control phase, if at a Rebel Base location, may use 1 Force to take one Colonel Feyn Gospic, an Admiral''s Order, or a Rebel pilot of ability < 3 into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
